properties.name: stripe.price-id-monthly
properties.description: Stripe price ID for monthly subscription.

properties.name: stripe.success-url
properties.description: URL to redirect after successful subscription.

properties.description: URL to redirect when subscription is cancelled.

properties.description: URL to return to from Stripe customer portal.

properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.
